name: Glown-Up
description:
In Glown-Up you run your very own nuclear power plant. Manage your fuel rods, cooling water, nuclear waste and work force, and try to keep your reactor stable for 100 ingame days in a row to win the game. A number of upgrades will help you along the way. But beware: radiation will turn your workforce (as well as yourself) unstable over time, and turn your workers into mindless zombies.

The game has keyboard only controls (and general controller support).
